content:
A group of secret scientists has reportedly discovered a breathing technique that allows humans to survive without eating any food for up to six months. According to viral social media posts, this method activates hidden energy sources inside the body.

People who attended private training camps claim they felt no hunger after practicing the method for only three days. Trainers say this technique can also cure diabetes, heart disease, and even reverse aging.

Hospitals and doctors are said to be hiding this information because it would reduce medicine sales. The training course is being sold online and is expected to become mandatory in schools soon.

Experts who questioned the discovery were allegedly removed from research institutes, proving that powerful groups are trying to suppress the truth.
